author: ddas
msg: HADOOP-2721. Uses setsid when creating new tasks so that subprocesses of this process will be within this new session (and this process will be the process leader for all the subprocesses). Killing the process leader, or the main Java task in Hadoop's case, kills the entire subtree of processes. Contributed by Ravi Gummadi.
